snippet: Bobby Ferguson, a contractor convicted of tag-teaming with former Mayor Kwame M. Kilpatrick of Detroit to commit corruption worth millions was sentenced Friday to 21 years in federal prison.
abstract: Bobby Ferguson, contractor convicted of tag-teaming with former Mayor Kwame M Kilpatrick of Detroit to commit corruption worth millions, is sentenced to 21 years in federal prison.
lead_paragraph: Bobby Ferguson, a contractor convicted of tag-teaming with former Mayor Kwame M. Kilpatrick of Detroit to commit corruption worth millions was sentenced Friday to 21 years in federal prison.

headline.main: Michigan: Friend of Ex-Mayor Gets 21-Year Sentence
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Friend of Ex-Mayor Gets 21-Year Sentence
